body: I found gold, but it turned to wood...
fucking douchebag, i hope you burn in hell

he didn't cheat cos he was not dating the brunette, it was just one fuck. and while i know he should be grateful and cherish her and try not to hurt her, thats not the same as being in love with her. if the other girl really rejected him, going out with the brunette and eventually falling for her for real  could be for the best, but it could also fail miserably if he keeps feeling that he's doing it as a second choice or out of gratitude or obligation instead of true love. seems to me he clearly picked his first love, and as much as it might suck for the brunette you can not blame him for it. but she just did not understand or accept his choice and keeps butting in.

The second half ruined it. The first half made it seem like a fun wholesome little story, and I was getting more and more erect, but then as soon as the second half starts he immediately cheats on his girlfriend and starts a two timing relationship, saying things like "I guess this relationship will continue for a while" when it's entirely his fault. I'm honestly surprised either girl would stay with him when he's shown himself to be so easily seduced.

This is perhaps the single exception to the "no cheating doujins" my headcanon is that they continue like this and have a three-way relationship going forward, with the girls either being BI or just really good friends
I see This as an absolute win
